channel.title: International User Research Book
channel.description:
I was sent a preview copy of this "pocket guide" as I've written for the same publisher, and it covers many of the themes we've discussed here with regard to appealing to different audiences.
http://www.fivesimplesteps.com/products/international-user-research

item.title: International User Research Book
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
Ah interesting. I definitely want to try to do more in this area going forward. There’s a whole big world out there!
